contentrichtext.text: {{unreferenced|date=July 2012}} [[Image:Situacion Xunqueira de Espadanedo.PNG|thumb|right|300px|Situation in [[Ourense]] in [[Galicia (Spain)|Galicia]]]] '''Xunqueira de Espadanedo''' is a [[municipality]] in [[Ourense (province)]] in the [[Galicia (Spain)|Galicia]] [[region]] of north-west [[Spain]]. {{Ourense (province)}} {{coord|42|19|03|N|7|37|43|W|source:eswiki|display=title}} [[Category:Municipalities in the Province of Ourense]] [[Category:Populated places in the Province of Ourense]] {{galicia-geo-stub}}
